title: Minecraft Windows Phone版已发布
author: 187sama
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2015-1-25 01:18 编辑 

MCPE已在Windows  Phone发布啦！你可以点击这里来购买:msft.it/6011Qj2X

原文:MCPE NEWS: Minecraft Pocket Edition is now available on the Windows phone! You can check it out here: msft.it/6011Qj2X
